alert.note: Alert for Western Bergen; Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:23PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Passaic, south central Orange and Rockland Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 822 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warwick, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ringwood, Warwick, Sloatsburg, Greenwood Lake, Upper Greenwood Lake, Hillburn and Tuxedo Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
